articles.title: American soccer journalist Grant Wahl dies at World Cup in Qatar - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Grant Wahl, one of the most well-known soccer writers in the United States, died early Saturday while covering the World Cup match between Argentina and the Netherlands.
articles.content: Grant Wahl, a renowned American soccer journalist, pictured here in 2014. (Photo by Fred Kfoury III/Icon Sportswire/Corbis/Icon Sportswire via Getty Images)
